title: PHOTOGRAPH ////// 37
description:
Photograph ////// 37


TrueCrimeGarage.com


June 15, 1989 - Port Saint Joe Florida... A woman driving on highway 98 pulls off of the road and into the parking lot of a covenience store and parks her car. She notices that she had parked next to a white Toyota cargo van and she could see a man with a mustache sitting in the driver's seat. She goes into the store and when she comes out she can see that the Toyota has left but before she gets in her car she spots something lying on the asphalt in the empty space next to hers. It was a polaroid photograph and the image on it would frighten a community and a nation. Come into the garage and get out of the heat as we discuss the weird story of the photograph.


Beer of the week - Summer Shandy by Leinenkugel brewing company

Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
